localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
blogPost.body: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
blogPost.title: Ojoy - Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality
blogPost.author: Addy Osmani

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和备忘录，并提高其质量。由于 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在浏览器客户端实现了这一点。与仅仅调整它们的大小相比，输出的图像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率图像并提高其质量。

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和備忘錄，並提高其質量。由於 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在瀏覽器客戶端實現了這一點。與僅僅調整它們的大小相比，輸出的圖像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率圖像並提高其質量。

previous.title: RT @iancassel: Investing is 5% intellect and 95% temperament. It's a test of how well you can sit quietly and do nothing when your emotions…

localize.full_text: RT @iancassel。投资是百分之五的智力和百分之九十五的气质。这是对你能否安静地坐在那里，什么都不做的考验，当你的情绪... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 投资是5%的智力和95%的气质。这是对你的考验，当你的情绪在叫嚣着要做错事的时候，你能不能安静地坐着什么都不做。

localize.full_text: RT @iancassel。投資是百分之五的智力和百分之九十五的氣質。這是對你能否安靜地坐在那裏，什麼都不做的考驗，當你的情緒... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 投資是5%的智力和95%的氣質。這是對你的考驗，當你的情緒在叫囂着要做錯事的時候，你能不能安靜地坐着什麼都不做。
